name: Geometry Jealousy
description:
what happens when some polygons get jealous of a circle? GEOMETRY JEALOUSY!

- temporary power ups to pick!

- three skills to use: DASH, FULL 360 SHOOT ROUND and SLOW MO!

- fast-paced action shooting!

HOW TO PLAY

- WSAD keys to move

- LEFT SHIFT to use skill, E to switch skill

- SPACE to pick up power up
